headline: JESUIT HAILS CHINA FOR BIRTH CONTROL
snippet: A Jesuit sociologist stated in a lecture here this week that Communist China had "the most efficient birth-control system," and predicted that other large societies would follow its example.

headline: HEALTH UNIT STIRS LOUSIANA INQUIRY; New Contract Sought Birth Control Aid for Poor Upset a Balance' Family Planning Program Is Questioned on Fund Use
snippet: Louisiana's statewide family planning program is fighting for its life before a Federal grand jury here and in negotiations with the United States Department of Health, Education and Welfare.

headline: The Pill Works-If You Take It; Birth Control
snippet: For the past five years American demographers have been congratulating themselves on the success of contraceptive practices in this country. They point out that the population growth rate for the nation has declined rapidly-from 1.5 per cent a year...

headline: American Birth-Control Device Being Tried by Women in Chinaa
snippet: A once-a-year birth-control device developed by an American pharmaceutical company is being tested on women in China. The tests are believed to be the first permitted by the authorities in that country on a foreign-made drug since the Communists took...

headline: India, in Economy Drive, Cuts Birth-Control Efforts; INDIA CUTS BACK ON BIRTH CONTROL Cuts in 'Nonessentials' Monetary Incentives Curbed Hindus Are Wary

headline: Margaret Sanger Birth-Control Clinic Will Merge Downtown and Expand Services; Help for Unmarried
snippet: The Margaret Sanger Re search Bureau, the nation's oldest family-planning clinic, will celebrate its 50th anniversary by closing the doors of its two brownstones at 17 and 19 West 16th Street on Aug. 31. The bureau has served 250,000 patients since...

headline: Birth Control Aid Backed
snippet: Okla Public Health Assn on Apr 13 endorses proposal to provide birth control services to sexually active minors without parental consent
